author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lydian Says ‍Amulsar Gold Project First Gold Production Remains On Track For Q3 2018
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Lydian International Ltd:
* LYDIAN PROVIDES CONSTRUCTION UPDATE FOR ITS AMULSAR GOLD PROJECT
* LYDIAN INTERNATIONAL - ‍AMULSAR GOLD PROJECT FIRST GOLD PRODUCTION REMAINS ON TRACK FOR Q3 2018 ALTHOUGH SOME AREAS PROGRESSED “SLOWER THAN PLANNED​”
* LYDIAN - ‍MANAGEMENT ANTICIPATES PRE-PRODUCTION CAPITAL COSTS TO INCREASE BY ABOUT 10-12% ABOVE CURRENT ESTIMATE OF $383 MILLION FOR AMULSAR GOLD PROJECT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
